Author: FeatherBark
Text: They sound like a jerk anyway and someone you would not want to be with. Please do not let this get to you (easier said than done, I know).  Be thankful they revealed their hideous nature before you got involved and remember to keep being awesome. You deserve respect and I am sure you will have no problem getting someone who would be lucky to have you.
